page.title: 08JENNIFER'S DAY AT MARYKIRK 2
page.content: Usually, we work on maths until break at 10:40 a.m. when we play at skipping. After break we have assembly with the school chaplain. We work on language until lunch break starts at 12:30 p.m. Our cook prepares a two course meal for 30 pupils and teachers. After lunch, we play together at rounders until 1:30 p.m. when it is time for class work until 3 o'clock. At 3:10 p.m., we have sewing. I am making a sampler of different stitches. When school ends at 3:55 p.m., I go home and watch television and check the greenhouse before tea. During the evening, I take my dog, Smokey, for a walk. I watch more television and I usually read before falling asleep.
